products.title: Paradise Slate Roman Blind
products.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This black roman blind has a bold cream and blue leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. Product id: db-arom0837 fabric colour: slate material: 82% polyester 18% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes paradise slate roman blind in black/multicoloured.

products.title: Paradise Slate
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1350mm min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 18% cotton / 82% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro. Buy made to measure paradise slate deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds.
